overview: Willy's Wife" tells the story of the murder of Adwina Johnson at the hand of her husband Willy with the help of his co-conspirators, Terry and Lewis. As Adwina's brother agitates toward the truth and law enforcement closes in, justice arrives violently before Terry, a mortician by trade, can complete his macabre masterpiece; a two-headed corpse.
title: Willy's Wife
